EmailTemplate.subject: See You Soon at Chelsea Piers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HiÂ {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I hope you are as excited as I am to hang out with the Turbonomic and Presidio crew tonight at the Golf Club at Chelsea Piers. When you arrive, please look for me in the lobby area, I will be wearing a Turbonomic golf polo so I should be easy to spot, and I will guide you to our bays! Thursday, September 28th, 5:30 p.m. EST The Golf Club at Chelsea Piers <[[https://www.chelseapiers.com/golf/driving-range/overview/]]> 59 Chelsea Piers, New York, NY 10011
Click here for additional venue information <[[https://www.chelseapiers.com/golf/]]>
If you have any issues finding our event this evening, please call me at 781-686-3634.
See you soon,
Megan
Megan Gay Marketing Program Manager Turbonomic, Inc.
